text: The is the coast guard of Japan. The Japan Coast Guard has about 13,700 personnel and is responsible for the protection of the coastline of Japan. The Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism is in charge of the coast guard. The Japan Coast Guard was founded in 1948. The motto of the Japan Coast Guard is . ==References== Category:1948 establishments in Asia Category:1940s establishments in Japan Coast Guard Category:Coast guards
title: Japan Coast Guard
